description: Response schema for Inventory items and holdings view

source.description: Source of metadata and format of the underlying record to the instance record

modeOfIssuance.description: The mode of issuance would tell if the material is a serial or not

natureOfContent.description: A periodical (which is a subset of serials) might also have a nature of content periodical (journal, newspaper)

id.description: System assigned unique ID of the holdings record

hrId.description: System-assigned sequential ID which maps to the Instance ID

suppressFromDiscovery.description: Indicate if record should not be displayed in a discovery system

formerIds.description: Identifiers of previously assigned ID(s) to the holdings record

permanentLocation.description: Permanent shelving location in which an item resides

campusName.description: The name of the campus, the second-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to

libraryName.description: The name of the library, the third-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to

institutionName.description: The name of the institution, the first-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to

temporaryLocation.description: Temporary location, shelving location, or holding which is a physical place where items are stored, or an Online location

campusName.description: The name of the campus, the second-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to

libraryName.description: The name of the library, the third-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to

institutionName.description: The name of the institution, the first-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to

callNumber.description: Call Number is an identifier assigned to a holding

prefix.description: Prefix of the call number on the holding level

suffix.description: Suffix of the call number on the holding level

typeId.description: Unique ID for the type of call number on a holdings record

typeName.description: Name of the call number type

callNumber.description: Call Number identifier assigned to a holding

shelvingTitle.description: Indicates the shelving form of title

receiptStatus.description: Receipt status (e.g. pending, awaiting receipt, partially received, fully received, receipt not required, and cancelled)

notes.description: Notes about action, copy, binding etc.

holdingsNoteTypeName.description: Name of the holdings note type

retentionPolicy.description: Records information regarding how long we have agreed to keep something

holdingsStatements.description: Notes about action, copy, binding etc.

statement.description: Name of the holdings note type
Textual description of the holdings of indexes

note.description: Note attached to a holdings statement

statement.description: Textual description of the holdings of supplementary material

note.description: Note attached to a holdings statement

copyNumber.description: Piece ID (usually barcode) for systems that do not use holdings record

numberOfItems.description: Amount of items of holdings record

publicDisplay.description: Defines if the receiving history should be visible to the public

enumeration.description: This is the volume/issue number (e.g. v.71:no.6-2)

chronology.description: Repeated element from Receiving history - Enumeration AND Receiving history - Chronology

tags.description: Arbitrary tags associated with this holding

id.description: Unique ID of the statistical code

name.description: Name or description of a statistical code

statisticalCodeType.description: Name of a statistical code type

source.description: Label indicating where the statistical code type entry originates from, i.e. 'folio' or 'local'

id.description: Unique ID of the item record

hrId.description: System-assigned sequential ID which maps to the Instance ID

holdingsRecordId.description: Unique ID for the type of this holdings record

suppressFromDiscovery.description: Indicate if record should not be displayed in a discovery system

formerIds.description: Previous identifiers assigned to the item

location.description: Current home location for the item

campusName.description: The name of the campus, the second-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to

libraryName.description: The name of the library, the third-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to

institutionName.description: The name of the institution, the first-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to

permanentLocation.description: Permanent shelving location in which an item resides

campusName.description: The name of the campus, the second-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to

libraryName.description: The name of the library, the third-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to

institutionName.description: The name of the institution, the first-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to

temporaryLocation.description: Temporary location, shelving location, or holding which is a physical place where items are stored, or an Online location

campusName.description: The name of the campus, the second-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to

libraryName.description: The name of the library, the third-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to

institutionName.description: The name of the institution, the first-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to

callNumber.description: An identifier assigned to an item, usually printed on a label attached to the item

prefix.description: Prefix of the call number on the item level

suffix.description: Suffix of the call number on the item level

typeName.description: Name of the call number type

callNumber.description: Identifier assigned to an item, used to determine the items physical position in a shelving sequence

barcode.description: Unique inventory control number for physical resources, used largely for circulation purposes

copyNumber.description: Copy number reflects if the library has a copy of a single-volume monograph; one copy of a multi-volume

volume.description: Volume is intended for monographs when a multipart monograph

enumeration.description: Descriptive information for the numbering scheme of a serial

chronology.description: Descriptive information for the dating scheme of a serial

yearCaption.description: Character(s) used to label a level of chronology, e.g., year 1985

itemIdentifier.description: Item identifier number, e.g. imported from the union catalogue

numberOfPieces.description: Used when an item is checked out or returned to verify that all parts are present (e.g. 7 CDs in a set)

missingPiecesDate.description: Date when the piece(s) went missing

itemDamagedStatusDate.description: Date and time when the item was damaged

materialType.description: Define what type of thing the item is

permanentLoanType.description: Default loan type for a given item. Loan types are tenant-defined

temporaryLoanType.description: Temporary loan type for a given item

electronicAccess.description: References for accessing the item by URL

uri.description: Uniform resource identifier (URI) is a string of characters designed for unambiguous identification of resources

linkText.description: Value of the MARC tag field 856 2nd indicator, where the values are

publicNote.description: URL public note to be displayed in the discovery

relationshipId.description: Relationship between the electronic resource at the location identified

materialsSpecification.description: Used to specify to what portion or aspect of the resource the electronic location and access information applies

notes.description: Notes about action, copy, binding etc.

itemNoteTypeName.description: Name of the item note type

tags.description: Arbitrary tags associated with this item

id.description: Unique ID of the statistical code

name.description: Name or description of a statistical code

statisticalCodeType.description: Name of a statistical code type

source.description: Label indicating where the statistical code type entry originates from, i.e. 'folio' or 'local'
